name: Syndicate 5 Brand New Colossus
description:
What would have happened if the Nazis had won World War Two?
The Allied forces are under your control and only you can stand up and fight the evil Dictator and his massive army! These alternative historical events unfold following World War Two. Defend the people from the Nazis approaching through the snowy expanse of Eastern Europe.
After the World War Two, all the was left was a disparate underground. Lead the Allied army, improve heroes’ moral, improve the robot, build towers, work out your own strategy, defend your land and banish the Dictator!
25 epic tables in post-WW2 Nazi territory await you:
Snow-covered Helsinki
East Germany
The suburbs of Warsaw
The winter forests of Finland
The events of Syndicate 5: Brand New Colossus takes places in an alternate reality following World War Two, in winter of 1967, with an army at your disposal, along with a powerful robot, which you can improve.
General, start building the towers and take up arms, the Dictator and his colossus are closing in!
